wikipedia_page.main: Nolan Hemmings (born 1970) is an English stage and film actor. He is known for his role as Charles E. Grant in Band of Brothers.

response: * Nolan Hemmings as Staff Sergeant Chuck Grant

On November 16, 1968, Hunnicutt married British actor David Hemmings, with whom she had a son, the actor Nolan Hemmings; they divorced in 1975. Hunnicutt married journalist Simon Jenkins in 1978. The couple lived in Primrose Hill, London, where they raised their son Edward. Jenkins was appointed a Knight Bachelor for services to journalism in the 2004 New Year honours. The couple divorced in 2009. In 2010, she started dating Richard Evans, Tennis Correspondent of The Daily Telegraph. The Daily Telegraph

In the Sharpe television series, his only appearance is in Sharpe's Eagle, where he is portrayed by Nolan Hemmings.
